AIX LVM Notes

  • Create a volume group 
    mkvg -B -s 256 -y <vgname> disk1 .....
  • Create a logical volume 
    mklv -tjfs2 -y <lvname> <vgname> <no_of_pps>
  • Create a filesystem 
    crfs -v jfs2 -A yes -t no -d <lvname> -m <mountpoint>
  • Import a Volume Group 
    importvg -n -y <vgname> disk ....
  • Export a Volume Group 
    vgexport <vgname>
  • Migrate a PV 
    migatepv <sourcepv> <destinpv1> <destinpv2> .....
  • Migrate a LP 
    migratelp <sourcedisk>:<source_lpno> <destin_disk>:<destin_pp>
